title: Poster, "U.S.Postage Stamp/ 1 July"
medium:
lithograph, papercut to mimic stamp perfor
Support: green paper
inscribed: Imprinted in dark green ink across top: Printed on Hammermill Cover, Green,Substance 65, Antique Finish/ Designed by Jane Bonsack, Washington University, School of Fine Arts, St. Louis, Mo. On verso: imprinted in darkgreen at LL: Artist's Comment/ July 1, 1847 was a significant date in history. The Postal Service of America adopted the adhesive/postage stamp..I chose the ten cent stamp with George Washington, one of the first of thistype...
description: "Poster designed to look like postage stamp with George Washington image; "cancellation" in red at LR"

tombstone.epitaph:
Poster, "U.S.Postage Stamp/ 1 July". lithograph, papercut to mimic stamp perfor
Support: green paper. 1991-69-84.
